categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace actors

nodes.text: Raymond Griffiths, sometimes credited as Ray Griffiths is a 4'2" actor who performed as Jake Lloyd's (Anakin Skywalker) second-unit stand-in in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace (1999, George Lucas). Griffiths also appeared, uncredited, as a Gonk droid both in Tatooine exteriors and in Watto's shop, in the same movie.
Griffiths is represented by Warwick Davis's agency, Willow Management, which is specialized in actors under five feet tall.
